articles.author: Sam Buckingham-Jones
articles.title: Foxtel, Cricket Australia in $1b broadcast rights deal
articles.description: With Seven paying less for free-to-air rights in Cricket Australia’s record deal, Foxtel has stumped up nearly $1 billion to cover the difference.
articles.content: Foxtels $140 million a year bill is made up of just shy of $130 million in cash and another $10 million in contra or free advertising and promotion of cricket. Mr Delany said the deal was worth doing… [+2709 chars]

articles.author: Kerrin Thomas
articles.title: Gippsland women's cricket bat maker Clare Johnston providing options for female athletes
articles.description: When women go searching for a cricket bat, they often find they have fewer options than their male counterparts, but Gippsland bat maker Clare Johnston hopes to change that.
articles.content:
When women go searching for a cricket bat, they often find they have fewer options than their male counterparts, but a Gippsland bat maker hopes to change that.

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
